name: spo-run-jobs-in-parallel
title: Run jobs in parallel using ForEach-Object -Parallel to iterate SharePoint site collections
shortDescription: This script sample shows the basic of using ForEach-Object -Parallel to speed up trivial SharePoint operations across many site collections
longDescription: This script sample shows the basic of using ForEach-Object -Parallel to speed up trivial SharePoint operations across many site collections

thumbnails.alt: Preview image of the sample for running jobs in parallel

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
